title: Price Reduced Energy Self Sufficient Country Home on the
text:
Price Reduced Energy Self Sufficient Country Home on the ad date: 10/10/2015 
Country Home on the Smith River 4125 Big Flat Road, Crescent City, CA Lovely country home on the Smith River. Updated kitchen, energy efficient stainless appliances, 11 foot island seats six. 2nd floor master suite w/walk-in shower, soaking tub and private deck. Two bedrooms downstairs, walk-in river rock shower, large loft and sun room. Gazebo overlooks path to pristine waters + 300' riverfront. Solar, inverter, batteries, propane, diesel, totally self sufficient. 2 separate parcels leaves 1 for a guest/vacation cabin. Seller is a California licensed real estate sales person. No. 1500419 $449,000 Melissa Blackburn, Agent 1000 Northcrest Dr., Crescent City 707-954-3505 or 464-9741, #01073103
